graph_title: Proportion of women in the Treptow-Köpenick district assembly (BVV)
indicator_name: Proportion of women in the Treptow-Köpenick district assembly (BVV)
target_name: SDG indicator - Proportion of women in city councils and district councils
page_content:
The indicator shows the number of seats held by women and men in the Treptow-Köpenick District Assembly (BVV) (as of 1 January each year). 
In 2021, only 33% of the BVV members were women.

de.graph_title: Proportion of women in the Treptow-Köpenick district assembly (BVV)
de.page_content: Der Indikator zeigt die Anzahl der Sitze von Frauen und Männern in der Bezirksverordnetenversammlung (BVV) Treptow-Köpenick (zum 1. Januar jeden Jahres). Im Jahr 2021 waren nur 33% der BVV-Mitglieder Frauen.
